game_description: HAX blurs the lines between digital and physical warfare. Battle Sentient Intelligent robots with digital weaponry in this fast-paced, early-access, VR shooter. With intuitive VR controls, HAX aims to stay true to the fun and excitement offered by traditional shooters, while harnessing the power and immersion of virtual reality. While this demo is single player only, when complete, HAX will be a multiplayer game. HAX is currently in development by Engine Organic Ltd. For more insight into HAX please visit EngineOrganic.com/HAX Discord: https://discord.com/invite/URPRwxTVSf
review_1: I love this game. When I first got it I had doubts that it would be fun because it was a demo. But it’s a demo that isn’t like any other. It’s not like when you complete it you have to buy the whole game. This is the full game so far and I love it. I just love running around with impact grenades and slamming them on the ground and getting multiple kills and just laughing. If I could give more then 5 stars I’d give it 10 out of 10 stars. As much as I love the game there’s some more features I wanna see. 1. More SMG’s, Shotguns, Pistols, AR’s and BR’s. 2. A Semi Automatic Sniper Rifle 3. Grenade Launchers or Rocket Launchers 4. More grenades 5. More Melees (eg; a frying pan) 6. More attachments on guns. 7. Different Ammo types (eg: explosive bullets) 8. The ability to dual wield pistols 9. No weapon progress resets when the full game comes out 10. Healing Items Even if these features don’t get added I’m still going to love playing the game the way it is.
